<jdbc-driver-params>    <url>jdbc:sqlserver://172.16.96.34:1433</url>    <driver-name>com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerXADataSource</driver-name>    <properties>      <property>        <name>user</name>        <value>iclub_ol</value>      </property>      <property>        <name>databaseName</name>        <value>ICar</value>      </property>    </properties>    <password-encrypted>{AES}utAYdjL8PwDs5CCbKyLY44fRXtHHLr7rP2+27dxNVOk=</password-encrypted>  </jdbc-driver-params>
